Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent damage = 15
debris = game:GetService("Debris") debris:AddItem(ball, 10)
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Pitch = .5 HitSound.Parent = ball
function onTouched(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") connection:disconnect() local bf = ball:FindFirstChild("BulletFloat") if (bf ~= nil) then bf:Remove() end
if humanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end
HitSound:Play()
end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) -- todo: make tag expire local tag = ball:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then local new_tag = tag:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(new_tag, 1) end end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)

local Tool = script.Parent;
local gun = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local leftGun local leftGunWeld
local holdAnim
local gripCopy = Tool.Grip local equipped = false
function doubleGun() --if true then return end if Tool.Parent ~= game.Workspace then return end if leftGun then return end print("Doubling") leftGun = gun:Clone()
leftGun.Name = "LeftGun" leftGun.Parent = Tool --game.Workspace -- Parenting it to the tool causes tons of random problems ;( --Workspace is bad too since it wont necessarily get cleaned up properly leftGun.CanCollide = true
leftGunWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftGunWeld.Part0 = gun leftGunWeld.Part1 = leftGun leftGunWeld.C1 = Tool.Grip * CFrame.Angles(math.pi *1.25 ,0,math.pi) + Vector3.new(.1,1,0) leftGunWeld.Parent = game.Workspace leftGunWeld.Name = "LeftWeld" end
doubleGun()
enabled = true
function fire(v, part)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
local noise = Vector3.new(math.random() - .5, math.random() - .5, math.random() - .5)
v = (v.unit *10 + noise).unit
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position if part ~= nil then spawnPos = part.Position else print("missing gun") return end
local PewPew = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("PewPew")
if (PewPew == nil) then PewPew = Instance.new("Sound") PewPew.Name = "PewPew" PewPew.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13510352" PewPew.Parent = Tool.Handle PewPew.Pitch = .85 PewPew.Volume = 1 end
spawnPos = spawnPos + (v * 6)
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) missile.Velocity = v * 200 missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(199) missile.Shape = 0 missile.BottomSurface = 0 missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Material = Enum.Material.CorrodedMetal missile.Elasticity = .05 missile.Friction = .7 missile.Name = "Bullet"
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.Name = "BulletFloat" force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.BulletScript:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
PewPew:Play()
end
local currentGun = gun
function gunUp() if currentGun == gun then Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,.981,-.196) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.196,.981) else if leftGunWeld then leftGunWeld.C1 = gripCopy * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2 - math.pi/20,0,0) + Vector3.new(0,-1,0) end end end
function gunOut() if currentGun == gun then Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) else if leftGunWeld then leftGunWeld.C1 = gripCopy * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) + Vector3.new(0,-1,0) end end end
function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local reload = .1 --if (isTurbo(character)) then -- reload = .25 -- print("turbo") --end
if currentGun == gun then currentGun = leftGun else currentGun = gun end
if currentGun then gunUp() fire(lookAt, currentGun) wait(reload) gunOut() wait(reload) end
enabled = true
end
function onEquipped() if equipped then return end equipped = true Tool.Handle.EquipSound:play()
print("Equipped")
--return vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myLeftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm")
holdAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldingGuns2) holdAnim:Play()
if leftGun then leftGun:Destroy() leftGun = nil end if leftGunWeld then leftGunWeld:Destroy() end if myTorso and myLeftArm then print("gun 2") wait(0.01) --I don't know why I need this here but it makes it work :( local rGun = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Handle") leftGun = rGun:Clone() leftGun.Name = "LeftGun" leftGun.Parent = Tool
leftGunWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftGunWeld.Part0 = myLeftArm leftGunWeld.Part1 = leftGun leftGunWeld.C1 = gripCopy * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) + Vector3.new(0,-1,0) leftGunWeld.Parent = myLeftArm leftGunWeld.Name = "LeftGrip"
end end
function onUnequipped() equipped = false if holdAnim == nil then print("missing animation") end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Stop() end
if leftGun then leftGun:Destroy() leftGun = nil end if leftGunWeld then leftGunWeld:Destroy() leftGunWeld = nil end wait(.1) doubleGun() end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(.1) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
local holdAnim
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
function onUnequippedLocal()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
